import React from 'react' export default function Input(props) { return (
{props.setnames(e.target.value)}} className=" block rounded-md px-6 pt-6 pb-1 w-full text-md text-white bg-neutral-700 appearance-none focus:outline-none focus:ring-0 peer invalid:border-b-1 " placeholder=" " />
) }
